alert.note: Alert for Henry; Jefferson; Johnson; Louisa; Muscatine; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 10 at 4:39PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Henry, western Louisa, southwestern Cedar, southeastern Johnson, eastern Washington, western Muscatine and eastern Jefferson Counties through 515 PM CST... At 438 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Riverside to Lockridge. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Riverside around 445 PM CST. Lone Tree and Wayland around 455 PM CST. Other locations in the path of these storms include Olds, Nichols, Crawfordsville, Winfield, Wyman, West Liberty and Columbus City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Henry; Jefferson; Johnson; Louisa; Muscatine; Washington
